headline: Jeff Bezos, Larry Page and Sergey Brin on the Verge Of $300 Billion Club
summary: The $200 billion club is beginning to look quaint as tech titans ride the wave of AI to unprecedented wealth heights. A recent report revealed that Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN) founder Jeff Bezos and Alphabet (NASDAQ:GOOGL) co-founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin are inching closer to the $300 billion mark, with their personal fortunes exceeding $250 billion each. headline: 'Americans Are Eager for a New Year's Reset.' Nearly Half of Adults' Finances Worsened in 2025 But Tax Season May Offer a Lifeline, Survey Says
summary: Almost half of U.S. adults' finances worsened in 2025, but the upcoming tax season could help struggling homeowners even more than usual, an Intuit Credit Karma survey released last month found. The most common reason for Americans’ financial hardships in the past year was unexpected expenses, followed by decreased credit scores, falling behind on monthly payments like mortgages and credit card bills, and the inability to afford necessities like groceries, the survey said. Next year's tax refund

headline: She Married Into $1M Of Debt And Asked, 'How Do I Not Murder Him?' Dave Ramsey Fires Back Without Sympathy. 'It's Not His Fault'
summary: Leona from Fairbanks, Alaska, called into “The Ramsey Show” to confess she had married a man without ever asking about his financial past. Months into their new life together, she discovered the two of them were nearly $1 million in debt. ‘You Walked In Blindly’ “I’m pretty newly married. Not my first rodeo,” Leona began.
